item.title: Microsoft Cost Management—2024 year in review
item.description: Introduction The year 2024 was all about accelerating advancements in AI technologies with improved and much more powerful language models, agent eco-systems and accompanying tools to build them, and of course advancements in the silicon layer. As companies adopt these new technologies, they are also focused on the ROI (Return on investment) and you as The post Microsoft Cost Management—2024 year in review appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.
